name: Low Cal Refreshing Salad
description: This Low Cal Refreshing Salad is perfect for those who are looking for a healthful twist in their diet. Loaded with high-protein, high-fiber ingredients and a hint of sweetness, this recipe is an ideal choice for those pursuing healthy yet delicious meals. Whether you're looking to healthify your diet or simply in search of a nutritious option, this salad encompasses all.
recipeIngredient: 1 head large, Lettuce, iceberg (includes crisphead types), raw

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the lettuce, carrots, cucumber under cold water. Pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the iceberg lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the cucumber into thin rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the egg until fully cooked, then set aside to cool. Once cooled, slice into strips or chop.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped lettuce, grated carrot, cucumber rounds, and ground almonds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the fried egg to the bowl and gently toss all ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately for the freshest taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
